729268f-a.title: Richmond: Park Avenue - Church Street
729268f-a.text:
Park Avenue, at Chnnch Street and the Staten Island Railroad
grade crossing. The view is eastward along the tracks across
Park Avenue and shows the Fort Richmond railroad station (platform).
June 1, 1935
P. L. Sperr
NO REPROAUCTIONS
(2)
A view of the newly constructed railroad trestle at
Park Avanue. The view is north on Park Avenue. The house on
the left is No. 56.
April 28, 1936
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729268f-a.folder: Park Avenue & Church Street, Staten Island, NY
